channel.title: A hard command REP++
channel.description:
ok i need a command that basicly duz this...
if (command.equalsignorecase("gamecount") sendmessage('your gamecount is currently at: gamecount HERE")
i need it 2 do that, but idk how lol
i need it 2 say the correct gamecount, like in the character folders it shows this
[code]character-height = 0 character-posx = 2958 character-posy = 3216 character-rights = 0 character-ismember = 0 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = ----------------- character-lastlogin = 20080620 character-energy = 100 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 35561[/code]
notice how his is 35561?
i want it 2 say "your gametime is currently 35561!" when they time ::gamecount
[size=16pt]REP++ 2 help[/size]

mainly cuz urs had 2 many errors, like 6 i belive, after changing got 1 error, this

client.java:10874: cannot find symbol symbol : method SendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client SendMessage("your gamecount is currently at +gameCount"); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
You Need A Method For It
